name: socialhome
description: Socialhome is a self-hosted, federated social media platform supporting streams, profiles, and ActivityPub federation. It allows rich content posting and follows in a grid-like UI.
features: Federated social: Connects with ActivityPub and Diaspora networks.
Content streams: Displays posts in customizable timeline streams.
Rich content: Supports text, images, videos, and embedded media in posts.
Profile pages: Creates personal profile pages with bio and content grid.
Following system: Follows users across federated social networks.
Content visibility: Controls post visibility as public, followers-only, or private.
Hashtag support: Organizes and discovers content with hashtags.
Reactions: Likes, shares, and comments on posts from federated users.
Notifications: Alerts on interactions, mentions, and new followers.
Search functionality: Finds users and content across the network.
Mobile responsive: Accesses social feed from any device.
API access: Integrates with third-party clients via API.
